channel.title: !server using no-ip! HELP PLEASE!
channel.description: Hi guys, I need some help on making a server which uses no-ip. I am currently unsure how to do this since I am a noob to computers :D so to sum it all up I would like some basic instruction even I could understand from step 1 (choosing a server to work on, and to edit) and to the last stage (getting the server to run and get other people on it) Thanks guys for reading this I hope you can give me a noob guide on how to create a server with the host to be a no-ip one. At least give me a link please :) once again thanks for reading this post and thanks for your help if you give me any :D chears :D

item.title: !server using no-ip! HELP PLEASE!
